titleStmt.title: Enchiridion Containing institutions, divine contemplative. Practicall. Moral ethicall. Oeconomicall. Politicall. Written by Fra: Quarles.
Enchiridion
titleStmt.author: Quarles, Francis, 1592-1644.

notesStmt.note: An edition of: Quarles, Francis. Enchyridion.
The words "Contemplative. Practicall." and "Ethicall. .. Politicall." are bracketed together on title page.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
